div.p: Greetings. I am sending two of my men to visit my son; but I did not want to send them off without my letter to you. I assume you have received the previous ones, in which I informed you of the deaths of the Queens of England and Hungary.
We still have no certain news about peace.
I arrived late at the assembly due to illness; now I am feeling better.
Please give my regards to Lords Walter and Martyr. Farewell.
